name: actiwell-dashboard-mockui
description: Actiwell Dashboard MockUI - HTML thuáº§n tÄ©nh cho GitLab Pages

scripts.dev: echo 'Starting development server...' && python -m http.server 8000 || python3 -m http.server 8000 || npx serve .
scripts.build: echo 'Preparing static files for GitLab Pages...' && mkdir -p public && cp -r assets public/ && cp -r pages public/ && cp -r data public/ && cp index.html public/ && cp test-charts.html public/ && cp *.md public/ && echo 'Static files ready!'
scripts.test: echo 'Testing file structure...' && test -f index.html && test -d assets && test -d pages && test -d data && echo 'All required files present!'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Ready for GitLab Pages deployment!'

author: Actiwell Team
